item.title: Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection announced for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Physical edition pre-orders open on January 30.

Limited Run Games has announced Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Physical pre-orders will be available from January 30 to March 1 in the following editions:

  • Standard Edition ($34.99)
    • A copy of the game
  • Classic Edition ($69.99)
    • A copy of the game
    • VHS slipcover and VHS tape box
    • Steelcase
  • Collector’s Edition ($109.99)
    • A copy of the game
    • VHS slipcover and VHS tape box
    • Steelcase
    • CD soundtrack
    • 12″ x 16″ double-sided poster
    • Mini cartridge replica collection
    • Acrylic standee diorama
    • Crazy caps (x6)
    • Trading cards (x5)

Here is an overview of the collection, via Limited Run Games:

About

Ren & Stimpy are back!

Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection includes:

  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Space Cadet Adventures (portable)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Veediots! (16-bit/portable)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Buckeroo$! (8-bit / 16-bit)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Time Warp (16-bit)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Fire Dogs (16-bit)

Key Features

Rewind, save everywhere, and other quality of life upgrades! Music player featuring the soundtracks from each game. Museum featuring artwork and classic packaging scans.
